actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A joint resolution authorizing a study of whether to create a corporation for profit to develop commercially feasible processes for the conversion of coal to crude oil and other liquid and gaseous hydrocarbons.

summary.text: Authorizes the Office of Emergency Preparedness to contract for a study of whether to create a Synthetic Hydrocarbon Fuel Corporation to develop commercially feasible processes for the conversion of coal to crude oil and other liquid and gaseous hydrocarbons. Authorizes appropriations of $200,000 to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing a study of whether to create a corporation for profit to develop commercially feasible processes for the conversion of coal to crude oil and other liquid and gaseous hydrocarbons.
